quality_assessment: Documentation is comprehensive and accurately reflects the codebase implementation with only minor improvements needed

issues.description: Documentation mentions rotated files use '.jsonl.rotated' extension, but code shows files are renamed with timestamp and .jsonl.gz extension
issues.current_content: Rotated files are moved with timestamp suffix: `events-{timestamp}.jsonl.rotated`
issues.should_be: Rotated files are renamed with timestamp: `events-{timestamp}.{timestamp}.jsonl.gz`
issues.fix_suggestion: Update rotation file naming convention to match actual implementation in event_writer.rs:86-89

issues.description: Export command is documented but the Export variant in EventsCommand shows it exists in implementation - minor feature completeness check
issues.fix_suggestion: Verify all export formats work as documented (json, csv, markdown)

positive_aspects: Complete coverage of all 24 event types with accurate categorization
Correct source references to event_logger.rs and event_writer.rs with line numbers
Accurate EventRecord structure with all fields documented including extensible metadata
Correct buffer configuration values (1000 events, 5 second flush)
Comprehensive CLI command documentation with all filtering options
Good troubleshooting section with buffer behavior explanation
Accurate note about CLI default path vs global storage path discrepancy
Valid cross-references to related documentation pages
improvement_suggestions: Add a visual diagram showing event flow from generation to storage
Add MkDocs Material admonitions for important notes (tip, warning)
Add code annotation explanations for the JSON structure example
Consider adding a table comparing event types by category

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
